channel.title: Bash on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on PR

item.title: How to view git change history of a Swift method
item.description: I knew git had a feature to get change history of a method. I used it all the time with ObjC but it never worked for swift files.

item.title: Script to delete xcode buildconfigurations
item.description: Yes, you do not need this solution, unless you know for sure you have one too many build configs and it is time consuming to delete one by one. And the $ Trillion/Billion company do not find enginneers to assign multiple edits in scheme/buildconfig/simulator list in xcode UI.

item.title: Whatchanged - Git history as HTML Report
item.description: Recently I was requested to produce a report of changes in a git repo between two tags by testing team. I am not sure the basis of the request, as they can go through the git repo themselves. I also kind of thought it is better to have a separate report that can be uploaded to their release ticket for archival; instead of going through each commits between revisions or any changes to repo history.

item.title: Script to publish Hugo sites for Github
item.description: While deploying my recent hugo website to github, I re-learnt that, you can only publish gh-pages from master branch for user or organization repository.
